changeset.author: dadrus
changeset.query: CREATE (d:DEPOSITOR:ENTITY {id: 1, NAME: "Max", SURNAME: "Payne", VERSION: 1})<-[:depositor]-(a:ACCOUNT:ENTITY {id: 1, DEPOSITOR_ID: 1, VERSION: 1, CREDIT_LIMIT: 100000.0, TYPE: "GIRO_ACCOUNT"})

changeset.author: dadrus
changeset.query: MATCH (d:DEPOSITOR:ENTITY {id: 1}) CREATE (d)-[:addresses]->(:ADDRESS:ENTITY {id: 1, DEPOSITOR_ID: 1, CITY: "Unknown", COUNTRY: "Unknown", STREET: "Unknown", ZIP_CODE: "111111" })

changeset.query: MATCH (a:ACCOUNT:ENTITY {id: 1}) CREATE (a)-[:entries]->(:ACCOUNT_ENTRY:ENTITY {id: 1, ACCOUNT_ID: 1, AMOUNT: 0.0, DATE: "2017/09/19 01:12:47:669 +0200", DETAILS: "deposit", REFERENCE: "ACC", TYPE: "DEBIT"})
